principals.title: Manage principals
principals.description: List and manage all the Principals available to the tools in the Integration Developer Hub.

kafka-configuration.title: Cluster configuration
kafka-configuration.description: View and change all the configuration for a cluster.

kafka-insights.title: Cluster insights
kafka-insights.description: Get insights about a cluster workload and set up rules to automatically rebalance the workload.

topic-manager.title: Kafka topics manager
topic-manager.description: List and delete topics for a cluster.

topic-creator.title: Create a Kafka topic
topic-creator.description: Create a new Kafka topic, set its properties.

message-browser.title: Message browser
message-browser.description: View the data being produced to a topic. Browse messages, seek to a specific offset or timestamp by partition.
message-browser.no_data_body: Data will appear shortly after we receive produced messages.
message-browser.no_results_body: Adjust your selection criteria and try again.
message-browser.partitions_hidden: {count, plural, =0 {And one more partition} {And {count} more partitions}}
message-browser.per_page_aria_label: Specify how many messages to retrieve
